Title: Imposes a fee on vacant commercial property
Summary: Imposes a fee on vacant commercial property that has remained continuously vacant for a period of six months or more to be paid to the state every thirtieth day such commercial property remains vacant.
LawCode: Add ยง99-x, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to imposing a fee on vacant commercial properties in cities with a population of one million or more
